Question: Skillfully forged paintings from this group were sold to French galleries like the one where this person bought the forgery.
Hints: Inspired by his philosophy classes, this person considered becoming a professor instead of an actor-comedian.
Expressing his affection through gifts of cars, bikes, etc., this person's father was stern, and not emotionally open to his son.
At age 67, this person became a first-time dad when Stringfield gave birth to a baby girl in December 2012.
